Experience Comfort and Flavor at Putnam Lodge
downArtboard 1
Book Your Stay
Welcome to Putnam Lodge
In the heart of Cross City, Florida, Putnam Lodge invites you to experience a unique blend of history and modern comfort. Originally built in 1927, this beautifully restored hotel showcases stunning pecky cypress woodwork, a nod to Florida’s rich timber heritage. Whether you're here for a peaceful getaway, a delicious meal at our steakhouse, or to celebrate a special occasion in our versatile event spaces, Putnam Lodge offers a timeless ambiance that connects you with the past while providing all the comforts of today.
Book a Room
Experience the Charm
Quaint Accommodations
Relax in our beautiful historic rooms that blend vintage charm with modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable stay.
Book Your Stay
Exceptional Dining
Savor mouthwatering dishes at our steakhouse, where every meal is crafted with care and the finest ingredients.
View Menu
Versatile Event Spaces
Host your special occasions in our stunning venues, perfect for weddings, parties, and corporate events.
Plan Your Event
Scenic RV Park
Enjoy the great outdoors at our RV park, where you can unwind and connect with nature in a peaceful setting.
Explore RV Options
A pair of black quotation marks on a white background.
I recently stayed at Putnam Lodge, and I can’t say enough about how charming and unique this place is! From the moment you step inside, you feel like you’ve been transported back in time. The historic decor, especially the gorgeous pecky cypress walls, gives the lodge so much character. I loved learning about the history of the old timber company and the town of Shamrock. But don’t let the vintage vibes fool you—our room was outfitted with all the modern amenities we could want. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the bathroom was spotless. The staff was warm and welcoming, making sure every need was met. Whether you're looking for a peaceful getaway or just appreciate history, this is a gem of a place to stay!
Sheila B.
Button
We had our wedding at the Putnam Lodge, and it was everything we dreamed of and more! The setting is simply magical—the historic building, the beautiful woodwork, and the manicured grounds made for a perfect backdrop. Our guests were raving about how gorgeous and unique the lodge was. The staff went above and beyond to make sure every detail was perfect, from the ceremony to the reception. The food was fantastic—our guests still talk about it! If you're looking for a wedding venue that combines elegance with old Florida charm, Putnam Lodge is the place. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience!
Melody T.
Button
Putnam Lodge was the perfect spot for a peaceful and relaxing weekend getaway. Tucked away in a quiet part of Florida, the lodge has this rustic charm that instantly makes you feel at home. The rooms were beautifully decorated, and the attention to detail was impressive. I loved the mix of modern comforts with the historic atmosphere. The restaurant on-site is a must-try—the food was delicious, and the service was top-notch. I spent time just wandering around the property, enjoying the gardens and soaking in the tranquility. It’s truly a hidden gem and worth the visit if you want a break from the hustle and bustle. I can’t wait to come back!
Sam G.
Button

photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: 0fb357d4
Share by:

Events
Celebrate Your Love at Historic Putnam Lodge
A Timeless Venue for Your Dream Wedding
Step into a world where history meets elegance at Historic Putnam Lodge. Nestled in the heart of Cross City, this stunning venue, originally built in the 1920s by the Putnam Lumber Company, offers a unique blend of vintage charm and modern luxury. With its exquisite pecky cypress woodwork and beautifully manicured 18-acre grounds, your special day will be surrounded by an atmosphere of intimacy and sophistication. Leave the hustle and bustle behind and create unforgettable memories in a setting that reflects both the past and the present.
Contact Us
Host Memorable Private Events at Putnam Lodge
Exciting Events at Putnam Lodge
At Putnam Lodge, we believe that every event deserves a touch of elegance and history. Nestled in scenic Cross City, this beautifully restored hotel offers an unforgettable backdrop for reunions, parties, and corporate gatherings. With our exquisite pecky cypress wood interiors, modern amenities, and exceptional dining options, you and your guests can enjoy a charming blend of the past and present. Whether you’re hosting an intimate celebration or a grand occasion, Putnam Lodge guarantees a unique experience that will leave lasting memories.
Plan Your Event
